---
title: Thoracic Outlet
---

The thoracic oulet refers to the space bordered by the first thoracic rib, [clavicle]({{< var ref-clavicle-bone.path >}}), [superior border of scapula]({{< var ref-scapula-bone.superior-border >}})

# Pathway of structures


- [Subclavian A]({{< var ref-subclavian-artery.path >}}) and [Inf trunk of the Brachial plexus]({{< var ref-brachial-plexus.inferior-trunk >}})
    - Pass behind clavicle, into [costoclavicular space]({{< var ref-costoclavicular-space.path >}})
    - Then passes then over [first rib]({{< var ref-1st-rib.path >}})
    - Through [Ant]({{< var ref-anterior-scalene.path >}}) and [Middle scalene]({{< var ref-middle-scalene.path >}})
    - Joined by subclavian vein

# Dysfunction

Thoracic Outlet Syndrome
